AboutPage.text: This application allows you to search and explore characters from the legendary Star Wars saga. You can browse through paginated results, view detailed character information, and enjoy a smooth navigation experience.

NoMatch.title: 404 - This is not the page you’re looking for
NoMatch.firstParagraph: The Force couldn’t find what you were seeking.
NoMatch.secondParagraph: Perhaps the page has gone to the Dark Side... May the Force be with you!
